Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>My records indicate <sp:5:0:0>that you are faster<sp:5:1:0>
and braver than any previous challenger.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I award this to you in honor of your
extraordinary record. <sp:5:1:0>You have earned it.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>! <sp:5:1:0>This is an astonishing
new record.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>My records indicate <sp:5:0:0>that you are faster<sp:5:1:0>
and braver than any previous challenger.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I award this to you in honor of your
extraordinary record. <sp:5:1:0>You have earned it.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>! <sp:5:1:0>A new record.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>You have somehow improved on your
previous time. <sp:5:1:0>Your dive technique is
almost miraculous.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I award this to you in honor of your
extraordinary record. <sp:5:1:0>You have earned it.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please tell me your name. <sp:5:1:0>I will register
you as the record holder.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>This is in honor of your extraordinary
record. <sp:5:1:0>You have earned it.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Understood. <sp:5:0:0>Your name is Link. <sp:5:1:0>I have
registered you as the record holder.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I regret to say that you are disqualified
due to leaving the course.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. <sp:5:1:0>Your pouch seems to be full.<sp:5:0:0>
You have no room for your prize.
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I would hate for you not to receive your
reward of a <clr:0000>large Zonai charge<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Let me
know when you have space for it.
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I will guide you to the starting point.<sp:5:0:0>
Confirm your authorization at the terminal
and then begin.
Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Will you attempt the ceremony again?
I will require an offering of <clr:0000>one
Zonai charge<clr:ffff>.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You are welcome to show your courage.<sp:5:1:0>
Do you want to start the dive ceremony
right away?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Could it be <sp:5:0:0>that you do not know of the
dive ceremony?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>My apologies. <sp:5:1:0>Allow me to explain.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The dive ceremony <sp:5:0:0>is a trial that tests
your courage. <sp:5:1:0>It is a rite by which Zonai
youth come of age.<sp:0:4:0>The starting position <sp:5:0:0>is the sky island
far above here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>The challenger leaps from there. <sp:5:0:0>They
must <clr:0000>pass through all the rings <clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>in <clr:0000>a set
amount of time<clr:ffff>.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Your time was <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>. Nice try.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>The trick to descending quickly is to <clr:0000>dive<clr:ffff>
as much as possible. <sp:5:1:0>Find your courage
and accelerate as much as you dare.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Understood. <sp:5:1:0>Safety protocols require a
practice run of the course first.<sp:0:4:0>This practice run has no time limit. <sp:5:1:0>Simply
focus on <clr:0000>going through all of the rings<clr:ffff>.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You have the fastest record in history.<sp:5:0:0>
But I believe that you are capable of
even more.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Go on. <sp:5:0:0>Let us begin the dive ceremony!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You <sp:5:0:0>failed to pass through every ring.<sp:5:1:0>
Please return to my position.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I wish you luck in formally overcoming the
trial. <sp:5:0:0>Those who succeed <sp:5:0:0>receive a <clr:0000>special
outfit<clr:ffff> to mark adulthood.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Go on. <sp:5:0:0>Show me your courage.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I regret to tell you that you did not pass
through all the rings. <sp:5:0:0>This attempt is
therefore disqualified.
Talk_24: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>That is too bad. <sp:5:0:0>I await your next attempt.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Then follow me to the starting position.<sp:5:1:0>
Your task is to pass through all of the
rings <clr:0000>in <sp:2:e:38:320053006b007900490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006d0070005400610072006700650074005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd> seconds or less<clr:ffff>.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You have already proved your maturity.<sp:5:1:0>
But there is nothing wrong with practice.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Go on. <sp:5:0:0>Show me your courage.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You did well for a practice run. <sp:5:0:0>It was
quite the dive. <sp:5:1:0>I eagerly anticipate your
performance in the full ceremony.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I would hate for you not to receive your
reward of a <clr:0000>special outfit<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Let me know
when you have reorganized your pouch.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You completed the ceremony. But you
must not settle for mere completion.<sp:0:4:0>Continue to apply yourself and aim to
beat our fastest recorded time of
<clr:0000><sp:2:e:38:320053006b007900490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006d0070005400610072006700650074005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd> seconds<clr:ffff>.
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I see you have made room in your pouch.<sp:5:1:0>
The time has come for your reward.
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I witnessed your dive earlier. <sp:5:0:0>You seem
to have come prepared.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Take care not to fall too fast. <sp:5:1:0>Note the
positioning of the rings as you fall.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I will send you back to the start once
again. <sp:5:1:0>Try to <clr:0000>pass through each ring<clr:ffff>
this time.
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That outfit marks your maturity. <sp:5:1:0>You have
earned it.
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome.<sp:0:4:0>This is the site of a ceremony to test
your courage. Courage is demonstrated
by diving headlong through the sky.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>No challengers have visited this island in
a long time. <sp:5:1:0>I am glad you have come.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then. <sp:5:0:0>Let us commence with the
dive ceremony. <sp:5:1:0>Are you prepared?
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Good morning.<sp:5:1:0> You must be a challenger
for the dive ceremony.
Talk_64:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I would hate for you not to receive your
reward of <clr:0000>five flame emitters<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Tell me
when you have reorganized your pouch.
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello. <sp:5:1:0>You must be a challenger for the
dive ceremony.
Talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I would hate for you not to receive your
reward of <clr:0000>five cart capsules<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Tell me
when you have reorganized your pouch.
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Good evening. <sp:5:1:0>You must be a challenger
for the dive ceremony.
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I would hate for you not to receive your
reward of <clr:0000>five wing capsules<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Tell me
when you have reorganized your pouch.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>I perhaps forgot to mention one thing.<sp:5:1:0>
I require <clr:0000>one Zonai charge<clr:ffff> as an offering.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Our custom since long ago has been for
participants in the ceremony to offer a
Zonai charge to the island.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>No Zonai charges have been provided
for many years. We are in short supply.<sp:5:1:0>
Your cooperation would be appreciated.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That is unfortunate. <sp:5:1:0>I will wait here until
you are ready.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh. <sp:5:1:0>You do not appear to have even one
<clr:0000>Zonai charge<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>It is rare that a participant fails to bring
a <clr:0000>Zonai charge<clr:ffff>. Hmm. <sp:5:1:0>We have no set
protocols for this situation.<sp:0:4:0>You are here and eager to participate.<sp:5:0:0>
I will make an exception and waive the
offering for you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>This will be a unique exception. <sp:5:1:0>Please do
not tell anybody I did this for you.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You did not bring a Zonai charge. <sp:5:1:0>That
does disqualify you from the ceremony.<sp:0:4:0>Be sure to bring a Zonai charge next time.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Your time is <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd>.<sp:2:13:38:32004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00540069006d00650072004d0069006c006c0069005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>I regret to tell you <sp:5:0:0>that is over the time
limit. <sp:5:1:0>You must complete the trial <clr:0000>within
<sp:2:e:38:320053006b007900490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006d0070005400610072006700650074005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd> seconds<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The trick to descending quickly is to <clr:0000>dive<clr:ffff>
as much as possible. <sp:5:1:0>Find your courage
and accelerate as much as you dare.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>You are leaving the course! <sp:5:1:0>Wait one
moment. <sp:5:0:0>I will come and get you.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Excellent. I will require <clr:0000>one Zonai charge<clr:ffff>
as an offering.
